creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: white-on-white embroidery; off-white very wide cotton pants; leg openings have two plastic (?) buttons and button holes; set-in pocket on left side ends in elaborate off-white embroidered pattern of cross stitch and raised embroidery in triangles down entire leg; right side has same embroidery but no pocket; drawstring not included; small opening in middle bottom
title: Shalvar Pants
